mapper.select:
SELECT c.`${entity}_id` FROM `${entity}_correction` c WHERE c.`organization_id` = #{organizationId} AND TO_CYRILLIC(c.`${entity}`) = TO_CYRILLIC(#{correction})
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM `${entity}` e WHERE e.`id` = c.`${entity}_id` AND e.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND e.`parent_id` = #{internalParentId})
LIMIT 0,1

SELECT c.`building_id` FROM `building_correction` c WHERE c.`organization_id` = #{organizationId} AND TO_CYRILLIC(c.`building_num`) = TO_CYRILLIC(#{buildingNumber})
AND c.`building_corp` IS NULL
AND TO_CYRILLIC(c.`building_corp`) = TO_CYRILLIC(#{buildingCorp})
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM `building` e WHERE e.`id` = c.`building_id` AND e.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND e.`parent_id` = #{internalParentId})
LIMIT 0,1

SELECT etc.`entity_type_id` typeId FROM `entity_type_correction` etc WHERE etc.`organization_id` = #{organizationId} AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM `entity_type` et WHERE et.`id` = etc.`entity_type_id` AND et.`end_date` IS NULL) LIMIT 0,1

SELECT c.`district` correction, c.`organization_district_code` code FROM `district_correction` c WHERE c.`organization_id` = #{organizationId} AND c.`district_id` = (SELECT oa.`value_id` FROM `organization_attribute` oa WHERE oa.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND oa.`object_id` = #{organizationId} AND oa.`attribute_type_id` = 902) LIMIT 0,1

where.if: AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM `${entity}_string_culture` sc WHERE sc.`value` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{internalObject}, '%') AND sc.`id` IN (SELECT a.`value_id` FROM `${entity}_attribute` a WHERE a.`object_id` = c.`${entity}_id` AND a.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND a.`attribute_type_id` = (SELECT eat.`id` FROM `entity_attribute_type` eat WHERE eat.`id` = ( SELECT e.`id` FROM `entity` e WHERE e.`entity_table` = #{entity}))))

AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM `organization_string_culture` osc WHERE osc.`value` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{organization}, '%') AND osc.`id` IN (SELECT oa.`value_id` FROM `organization_attribute` oa WHERE oa.`object_id` = c.`organization_id` AND oa.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND oa.`attribute_type_id` = 900))
